text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The morning of the NHK Mile Cup, Fuji<n>Kiseki
asks the younger racer she hopes<n>to inspire to
watch her race.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Fuji Kiseki tells her about the hopes<n>she's placed
on the mile tour and how<n>she wants to deliver the
best races<n>possible. No matter the stage, it's the<n>
actors that make the show.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The stands are filled with mixed feelings.<n>There
are people disappointed that Fuji<n>Kiseki changed
courses and fans who are<n>wholeheartedly rooting
for her. Her<n>younger schoolmate is there too.
